name: Nubefone: Low-cost calls
description: FREE GIFT CREDIT TO START WITH!  Nubefone its BETTER than other international calling apps:  + Clear call quality: you dont need internet connection during the call. + Low calling rates: to landlines/mobiles anywhere. + No fees or hidden charges. + Earn FREE credit for every invited contact who uses Nubefone. + No expiration date balance. + Compatible with all the operators. + The contact you call doesnt need to have Nubefone.  + Worldwide call rates one tap away. + In App-Purchases.  - SET UP NUBEFONE: to create your Nubefone Account you need a phone number from one of these countries: Germany, Andorra, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Brazil, Bulgaria, Canada, Colombia, Costa Rica, Croatia, Chile, China, Cyprus, Denmark, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, The United States, Finland, France, Greece, Hong Kong, Hungary, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Lybia, Malta, Mexico, Norway, Panama, Netherlands, Paraguay, Peru, Poland, Portugal, Qatar, United Kingdom, Rep. It checks, Rep. Dominican, Romania, Russia, Sweden, Switzerland, Uruguay and Venezuela.  You can make phone calls to anywhere in the world. Whoever you call doesnt need Nubefone.  - GET FREE CREDIT: tell your friends about Nubefone and earn FREE credit for every invited contact who uses Nubefone.  AND MUCH MORE THINGS  - NUBEFONE FAMILY: add up to 10 more users to your account, including per user usage control and one single shared top-up for all.  - NUBEFONE FOR BUSINESS: special accounts for business, cost control, centralized user management
